backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining Veda and language types, mantra ordering, and a map storing sample Samaveda mantras 47 and 48 with translations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing requested frontend fixes, diagnostics additions, and affected files with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for build and feature tracking.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide explaining prerequisites, steps, and verification for deploying the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entry point.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rule sending all paths to index.html for SPA routing.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown paths to index.html while preserving the original URL.
frontend/README.md: Project overview with features, canister ID placeholders, development notes, and template editor instructions.
frontend/scripts/build.sh: Build script that cleans, installs dependencies, generates bindings, builds the frontend, and compiles canisters.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Script for deploying canisters to IC mainnet with safety prompts and post-deploy output.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, dropdown state, mantra fetching, inline loading/error states, and diagnostics display.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsPanel: Expandable diagnostics panel showing backend status, counts, and specific mantra existence with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/MantraAudioSecti: Handles loading, playing, and uploading mantra audio with authentication checks and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/MantraContentTem: Loads, edits, validates, and submits mantra content templates with field parsing and form state management.
frontend/src/components/MantraMetadataHe: Displays metadata text while visually emphasizing tokens ending with a colon.
frontend/src/components/ShareArea.tsx: Renders a share card that shows the current URL and provides a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch mantra numbers and related text/metadata from the backend with aggressive refetching and actor-based enablement.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables plus utility and component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wiring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/selectValueGuards.ts: Provides helpers to validate select values and ensure bigint selections are valid.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, and custom utilities using CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, issues, and feature requirements related to fixing the mantra dropdown and adding diagnostics.
